title: Maharani Cupcakes
ingredients: ['Sweet Basil Cream:', '350ml whipping cream', '1 bunch fresh basil, washed and dried', 'Sweet Curry Lemon Curd:', '200g caster sugar', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '2 tablespoons mild curry powder', '180ml fresh lemon juice', '3 lemons, zested', '60g unsalted butter, melted', 'Coconut Cupcakes', '300g caster sugar', '225g butter', '5 eggs', '250ml buttermilk', '250g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '75g desiccated coconut', '750g icing sugar, divided', '110g cream cheese, room temperature', '1 tablespoon silver dragees']
